summary: The Advancing Water Reuse Act (H.R. 2940) amends the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a 30% investment tax credit for qualifying water reuse projects. Such projects include installing on-site water recycling systems, replacing freshwater with recycled water from municipal providers, and building or expanding municipal water recycling systems. The bill defines qualified property and details special rules for property transferred to utilities. The credit applies to projects starting before January 1, 2033.
